questions.question: Why is it hotter at the equator?

choices.answer: the sun's rays are more concentrated
It is closer to the core of the earth
it has a high pressure system
It is where Africa is

choices.answer: the temperature and precipitation of an area

The percentage of plants and animals that live there
the climate of a continent

they hold water and store it for later
they cup water in the leaves stopping it from falling

choices.answer: Emergent layer
Forest floor
Understory

questions.question: What is the climate like in the tropical rainforest?

choices.answer: Cold and wet

questions.question: What is the soil like in tropical rainforests?

choices.answer: I love soil
infertile and thin
fertile and thick

questions.question: Why is the soil so infertile?

choices.answer: Because it wants to be
The sun soaks up all the nutrients
The heavy rain washes away the nutrients

questions.question: How have emergent trees adapted to the tropical rainforest?

choices.answer: They are tall so they don't get eaten by animals
They have buttress roots to stabilise them in shallow soil
They have leaves to soak up sunlight
They grow round other trees for support
